basic_info.name: Why Join Lenora College of Engineering

Section.name: About Lenora College of Engineering
Section.description:
Lenora College of Engineering, East Godavari is dedicated to provide contemporary and quality training, education and research facilities to its students in newly evolving research areas or the augmentation of human resource. It is focused towards evolving technical competencies so that it remains among the reputed and well-equipped global institutions.
Establishment Year
2000
University Type
Private
Chair person of the University
B.R.Sarath Kumar
Approval
All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE)
Campus Strength
300
Sports and cultural events
10
Campus Residents
900
How to Reach
Rampachodavaram Bus Stop at 1 Km
Nearest Railway Station
Samalakot Junction at 75 Km
Nearest Airport
Rajahmundry Airport at 44 Km
Lenora College of Engineering AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
Transportation Support - The college offers Bus facility from Rajahmundry to Rampachodavaram via Korkonda, Gokavaram for staff and students
Boarding Facility – Individual hostel facilities are provided to both girls and boys and these hostels are located in hygienic and clean environment. transport facilities are also provided to the students.
